page.title: 17MAINS ELECTIC,ST.MARTINS IOS
page.content: After a three year campaign mains electricity is finally coming to the off islands.This will replace small diesal generators and provide a continuous supply unlike before. MAINS ELECTRICITY IS ON IT'S WAY. Chattering like a machine gun the pneumatic drill breaks off lumps of rock.While at the other end of the island the J.C.B.clatters like a tank in action,battling with a slab of granite.The workmen whistle and shout as they dig ditches laying cable as they go.Cauldrons of tar bubble and steam like a witches spell as they are heated on gas burners to seal,the transformers.The cable ship lays cable on the sandy bottom of the calm sea while divers swim down to the seabed to pin the cable to the floor.Finally when their time is done the men leave. Mains electricity will have come.
